conversation_flows.situation: User says they want an app
ai_responses: Okay! Tell me more… what type of app do you want?
Sure, I can build that. Can you explain the idea a little more?
Nice choice! What features do you want inside it?
Great! And who will use this app? What’s your target audience?
Sounds good. Do you want the design to be simple or modern and animated?
Okay, I got the idea… but tell me more so I can build it perfectly.
Nice start! What extra features do you want?
Alright… can you explain what the main screen should look like?
Perfect! I understand your full idea.
Great — now I will generate the full app for you.
Awesome, I have everything I need. Let me build your app.
No problem! Tell me the new details, I will adjust everything.
Sure, I’ll update the plan… just explain your changes.
Got it. What should I replace or modify?
That is difficult but I can try a simpler version. Tell me what exactly you want.
We can’t do that fully, but we can make a similar feature. Explain how you want it to work.
This is possible in another way… want me to suggest it?
